name: Humankind discovers fire
description:
When humans learned to control fire, the unstoppable journey which culminates in our epoch began. Where (and when) will it end?

Capturing life’s impermanency and its pulsating energy are at the core of the project Impermanent Sculptures. It relates to something prior to life itself, rather an impulse, a primordial force, one that penetrates and emanates from everything, living and seemingly non-living beings. It illustrates an invisible force that will endure even after we return to dust, like the sterile soil of the Moon.

This 4K animated GIF depicts the result which is conceived from real action with fireworks, a performance that shifts between spontaneity and control. Post-edit is limited to blending photos together, but never creating digital artifacts that were not originally photographed.

To paint with light in a three-dimensional space is to bring one’s thoughts from the unconscious to the conscious.
.
Edition 1/1
